commentary: Here's another brief episode of: Gamzee's fooling around uselessly in the background while his "best friend" grieves the loss of their mutual friend, doesn't actually give a fuck about anything, but for some reason a lot of people thought he was a good and nice guy before he went "crazy."/shrug/ Oh hey, Jack is watching through the exile terminals in the far future as Slick, hatefully reminiscing. This must mean...
